author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: Trump backs away from New York quarantine
description: The US president now says the move is not necessary, after the idea was labelled "preposterous".
content:
Media captionDonald Trump tells reporters he is "considering quarantine" for some areas
US President Donald Trump has said quarantining New York "will not be necessary", after the state's governor said doing so would be "preposterous".
